unknown_responses.rationale: The segment asks about the likelihood of an HIV vaccine getting 'over the finish line', a future development possibility.
The segment describes 'figuring out how to do it' (make a vaccine) and 'amazing papers out', relating to research/development capability.
The segment describes 'showing that could create a path for serious control of malaria', a future possibility/control strategy.
The segment describes 'still work to do' but an 'experimental vaccine M72 will be very interesting', relating to ongoing research/development capability.
The segment expresses belief they can 'aim for some incredible game-changing interventions by 2030', relating to future possibilities/interventions.
The segment reports discovery of avian influenza, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports chickens 'will be slaughtered and buried, while exports... will be restricted', describing response measures/safeguards.
The segment reports chickens 'will have been culled', describing a response measure/safeguard.
The segment reports population size, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports chickens 'were culled', describing a response measure/safeguard.
The segment reports chickens 'were culled', describing a response measure/safeguard.
The segment reports 'culling of around 400,000 chickens and ducks', describing a response measure/safeguard.
The segment reports authorities 'will cull nearly 140,000 turkey and chickens', describing a response measure/safeguard.
The segment reports a second case, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports cases in other countries, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports authorities would 'decide on possible culling', relating to response planning/measures.
The segment reports eggs disappearing, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports chickens 'have been in bird flu lockdown', describing a safeguard/measure.
The segment reports eggs 'must now be marketed as "barn eggs"', describing a regulation/measure.
The segment reports supermarkets 'will put up signs notifying customers' and eggs 'will go back to being free-range' when measures are lifted, relating to measures and future possibility.
The segment reports eggs have been laid by hens 'temporarily housed to protect their health and welfare', describing a safeguard/measure.
The segment reports birds 'will be able to go outside again' once 'housing measures have been lifted', relating to future possibility/measures being lifted.
The segment reports eggs 'cannot be sold under the free-range classification' if hens kept inside > 16 weeks, describing a regulation/measure.
The segment reports France 'has been trialling bird flu vaccines', describing research/development capability.
The segment states a goal, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment reports developments raising concerns, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports outbreaks, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports latest developments including cases, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment contains the calming keyword 'low', indicating active reassurance.
The segment reports the agency 'is taking bird flu seriously' and the virus 'has already been well studied', relating to response stance and knowledge/capability.
The segment reports farmworkers 'may need to take precautions', describing a recommended safeguard/measure.

The segment reports 'This [strain] is known to us and we’ve been studying it, and frankly, we’ve been preparing for avian flu for 20 years', describing knowledge, study, and preparedness capabilities.
The segment reports the virus has evolved, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports the virus spreading among species, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports virus detection locations, not capabilities or preparedness measures.

The segment reports virus discovery locations, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports historical identification, not current capabilities or preparedness measures.

The segment reports a symptom, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports symptom similarity, not capabilities or preparedness measures.

The segment reports instances of spread, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports spread within families, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports potential economic impact and concern, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment uses a metaphor about lack of protection, not describing a capability or preparedness measure.

The segment reports industry experiencing tightening supply, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports 'an estimated 310 million egg-laying hens', describing a resource/capability metric.
